name: Peace of Mind
summary:
You just recently closed on your dream home. It’s perfect! Well, almost…

You quickly find out there's a ghost inhabiting your new abode, and they aren’t too happy with your arrival.
However, there is hope! It seems when you bring certain mementos to them, they become docile, and begin to fade. Items that carry bad memories agitate them more, causing them to lash out at you!
In order to save your home, you must restore the memories of the former resident, and help them find peace. Fail to bring the correct items in time, and the ghosts will make your stay a little more…eternal.
